artists.name: Black Sabbath
artists.description: One of the first heavy metal bands, and one of the best.

artists.name: Iron Maiden
artists.description: A shining example of why heavy metal is great.

artists.name: Judas Priest
artists.description: They're called the 'Metal Gods' for a reason.

artists.name: Megadeth
artists.description: These guys put out some excellent music.

artists.name: Death
artists.description: They pioneered an entire genre of metal - enough said.

artists.name: Emperor
artists.description: Easily one of the best black metal bands of all time.

artists.name: Anthrax
artists.description: One of the most innovative metal groups out there.

artists.name: Pestilence
artists.description: Gut-churning guitars and tortured vocals? Yes, please!

artists.name: Mayhem
artists.description: If you're looking for true black metal, you've found it.

artists.name: Testament
artists.description: If you like thrash metal but want even more heaviness, these guys are for you.

artists.name: Morbid Angel
artists.description: Their music is brutal, unrelenting, and a perfect representation of death metal.

artists.name: Dissection
artists.description: A must listen for those into chilling, abrasive poetry from the frozen north.

artists.name: Opeth
artists.description: From mellow guitar licks to full-blown death growls, Opeth has you covered.

artists.name: Atheist
artists.description: Like extreme tempo changes and meandering time signatures? You're in the right place.

artists.name: Kreator
artists.description: A darker, heavier brand of thrash - you have been warned.

artists.name: Immortal
artists.description: Their music conjures up bitter winds from the remorseless winters of Scandanavia.

artists.name: Blotted Science
artists.description: A technical, instrumental, prog metal supergroup. What can go wrong?

artists.name: Dream Theater
artists.description: These guys are the definitive prog metal band.
